language.entry: Lost Shipment
Seems like this was abandoned in a hurry.
Interact to gather the shipment.
Enchantment Table
Can be used to create enchanted weapons.
Interact with a enchant item.
You have created a new enchanted item.
You require a enchantment item to use this table.
Deceased Relic Hunter
This relic hunter wandered into the wrong area.
Interact to search the corpse.
Enchant Items
Explore 40% of rooms
The blacksmith has told us the location of enchantment tables that can be found in the outskirts of the hamlet. We can use the tables to create enchanted items.
Explore 40% of rooms
{?hero_names}%s has volunteered to enter the {?difficulty}%s {?length}%s dungeon in an attempt create enchanted items.
{?hero_names}%s successfully enchanted new trinkets. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s somehow managed to fail enchanting trinkets. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
Use the enchantment items on the curios in order to create enchated items.

Lost Shipments
The Blacksmith was supposed to receive some important shipments by ship this week. They still don't have arrived. Set out to the Cove and recover the shipments.
Recover the Lost Shipments
Activate 3 Lost Shipments
Explore the Cove and find the shipments the Blacksmith was supposed to receive. He promised we could keep any addition items we find.
[Recover the Lost Shipments

{?hero_names}%s failed to recover the lost shipments. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)

Ambushed Caravan

A caravan guard just arrived at the hamlet. The caravan he was part of got ambushed by something in the weald. The leader of the caravan, a relic hunter, was last seen defending the caravan with his life.
Search for the Deceased Relic Hunter
Interact with the corpse of the Relic Hunter

We should take this opportunity to search for any trinkets we could use for our cause. We should be careful however, the area is crawling with monsters and the one responsible for the ambush might still be around.
[Search for the Deceased Relic Hunter
{?hero_names}%s has volunteered to enter the {?difficulty}%s {?length}%s dungeon in an attempt to find the Deceased Relic Hunter
{?hero_names}%s managed to defeat the ambushers and successfully found the deceased relic hunter. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s got overwhelmed by the ambushers and failed to find the deceased relic hunter. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
Follow the path that the caravan took and attempt to locate the corpse of the relic hunter.

Ambushed Caravan

A caravan guard just arrived at the hamlet. The caravan he was part of got ambushed by something in the weald. The leader of the caravan, a relic hunter, was last seen defending the caravan with his life.
Search for the Deceased Relic Hunter
Interact with the corpse of the Relic Hunter

We should take this opportunity to search for any trinkets we could use for our cause. We should be careful however, the area is crawling with monsters and the one responsible for the ambush might still be around.
